text: Hi, is it possible to create a new "widget" with just a button that triggers a webhook to certain URL? (Basically I am trying to add a button in the Contact page)
Hey Tracey has anyone reached out to you yet? Do you have a link to the site?

How to set different time zones for multiple domains for scheduling social posts and blog posts? So we are a global company where need different blog posts schedule at different time zones, so how would a HubSpot portal be setup appropriately to use multiple time zones? I see an area with General Info but needs some direction here:
Hi - quick question: Are the “Drag and Drop” templates deprecated?
if you mean the templates in the “Drag and Drop” Design manager templates, then they are not used in themes

Hello! My name is Matt, and I work in Marketing Ops at UserLeap. We are having an issue where the HubSpot tracking code is installed on both our marketing website and our product - <http://app.userleap.com|app.userleap.com> - but it seems like the tracking isn't working right on the product. For example, I can't see webpage views in HubSpot when they're in-product webpage views.

Any ideas what might be going on here or how to troubleshoot? Thank you.
To provide some more detail here, it seems like web views in the product are only sent when the page is reloaded, but not otherwise.
<@U24DCSJBE> are we able to grab those via hubl for website pages etc?
